author: Jamie Boudreau
description: Bourbon and apricot are a well-established match, and everybody who drinks Manhattan's will recognise how well sweet vermouth and bitters work with bourbon. Hence, it's perhaps not surprising that this spirit-forward cocktail is delicious.
name: Praecocia Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
